Suspends the schedule and assigns value "Y" for the "paused" parameter.

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["action","client_key","schedule_id","hash"],"properties":{"action":{"type":"string","enum":["PAUSE_SCHEDULE"],"description":"Fixed value \"PAUSE_SCHEDULE\"","example":"PAUSE_SCHEDULE"},"client_key":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique key identifying the client","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"},"schedule_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Schedule ID in the Payment Platform","example":"321e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174999"},"hash":{"type":"string","description":"Request signature (see Appendix A, Formula 4)","example":"hashsignature1234567890abcdef"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
